articles.title: The smaller Fairphone 6 introduces swappable accessories - The Verge
articles.description: The Fairphone 6 is smaller and lighter but offers better battery life and a more modular design, making it easier to repair and upgrade than other phones.

articles.title: Microsoft Is Blocking Google Chrome, Windows 11 Users Complain - Forbes
articles.description: Windows 11 users are complaining that Microsoft Family Safety has blocked Google Chrome — here’s what we know and how to fix it.

articles.title: Microsoft Extends Windows 10 Security Updates for One Year with New Enrollment Options - The Hacker News
articles.description: Microsoft offers Windows 10 ESU program with free cloud sync or paid options for extra year of security updates.

articles.title: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate 13.0.4 update out now, patch notes - Nintendo Everything
